sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function OrderItem({item, value}) { const {id, img, title, price, total, count} = item; const {increment, decrement, removeItem } = value; return (
product : {title}
price : $ {price}
decrement(id)}>- {count} increment(id)}>+
removeItem(id)}>
item total : $ {total}
) }
